articles.author: James T. Arredy, Liza Lin
articles.title: U.S. plans to evacuate Americans with charter flight from epidemic stricken Wuhan
articles.description: The U.S. government is arranging a charter flight Sunday to evacuate its citizens and diplomats from the epidemic-stricken Chinese city of Wuhan to the U.S.
articles.content:
The U.S. government is arranging a charter flight Sunday to evacuate its citizens and diplomats from the epidemic-stricken Chinese city of Wuhan to the U.S.
